title: Online Environmental Education with Ecopsychological Approach: Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Project-based exploration of socio-environmental issues for office/administrative professionals, emphasizing virtual environment experiences via digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply ecological psychology theory to analyze social interaction patterns in virtual environment simulations.
Through PBL projects, learners can propose solutions to real-world social-environmental issues (e.g., urban green space planning).
Learners can complete environment-context-based reports with small teams using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
